languages.text: {n}Шепоты вцепляются в самое болезненное воспоминание словно в оголенный нерв — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}червоточина{/d} в вашей душе отзывается мрачным эхом. Нечто из темных грез пристально смотрит на вас сквозь нее.{/n} "Ты тронут{mf||а} скверной. Проклятая душа, ты чуешь, что рок твой вот-вот обрушится на тебя!"

{n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve, while the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}canker{/d} in your soul echoes ominously in response. Through the woman standing before you, something is staring at you, something you have seen only in your darkest dreams.{/n} "You are touched by corruption. You know that your doom is nigh, cursed soul!"
languages.original_text: {n}Шепоты вцепляются в самое болезненное воспоминание словно в оголенный нерв — {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}червоточина{/d} в вашей душе отзывается мрачным эхом. Нечто из темных грез пристально смотрит на вас сквозь нее.{/n} "Ты тронут{mf||а} скверной. Проклятая душа, ты чуешь, что рок твой вот-вот обрушится на тебя!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as if it were an exposed nerve, and the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}canker{/d} in your soul echoes ominously in response. Something is staring at you through the woman before you, something you have seen in your dark dreams.{/n} "You are touched by corruption. You know that your doom is nigh, cursed soul!"

Something is staring at you through the woman before you, something you have seen in your dark dreams.{/n} "You are touched by corruption. You know that your doom is nigh, cursed soul!"

languages.text: {n}Das Flüstern bohrt seine Zähne in deine schmerzhafteste Erinnerung, als wäre sie ein freiliegender Nerv, während das {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Geschwür{/d} in deiner Seele unheilvoll zu antworten scheint. Jemand starrt dich durch die Frau vor dir an, etwas, das du bis dato nur in deinen dunkelsten Träumen gesehen hast.{/n} "Die Verderbnis hat Euch befallen. Ihr wisst, dass Euer Ende naht, verdammte Seele!"
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve, while the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}canker{/d} in your soul echoes ominously in response. Through the woman standing before you, something is staring at you, something you have seen only in your darkest dreams.{/n} "You are touched by corruption. You know that your doom is nigh, cursed soul!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Flüstern bohrt seine Zähne in deine schmerzhafteste Erinnerung, als wäre sie ein freiliegender Nerv, während das {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}Geschwür{/d} in deiner Seele unheilvoll zu antworten scheint. Jemand starrt dich durch die Frau vor dir an, etwas, das du bis dato nur in deinen dunkelsten Träumen gesehen hast.{/n} "Die Verderbnis hat Euch befallen. Ihr wisst, dass Euer Ende naht, verdammte Seele!"

languages.text: {n}Les murmures plantent leurs crocs dans votre souvenir le plus douloureux comme dans un nerf à vif, tandis que le {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}chancre{/d} de votre âme lui fait sinistrement écho. Quelque chose vous observe au travers de la femme qui se tient devant vous, quelque chose que vous n'avez vu que dans vos pires cauchemars.{/n} « La corruption s'est installée en vous. Vous savez que votre chute est proche, âme maudite ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve, while the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}canker{/d} in your soul echoes ominously in response. Through the woman standing before you, something is staring at you, something you have seen only in your darkest dreams.{/n} "You are touched by corruption. You know that your doom is nigh, cursed soul!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les murmures plantent leurs crocs dans votre souvenir le plus douloureux comme dans un nerf à vif, tandis que le {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}chancre{/d} de votre âme lui fait sinistrement écho. Quelque chose vous observe au travers de la femme qui se tient devant vous, quelque chose que vous n'avez vu que dans vos pires cauchemars.{/n} « La corruption s'est installée en vous. Vous savez que votre chute est proche, âme maudite ! »

languages.text: {n}Los susurros clavan sus colmillos en tu recuerdo más doloroso como si fuera un nervio expuesto, mientras la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}llaga{/d} de tu alma resuena siniestramente en respuesta. Algo te mira a través de la mujer que tienes delante. Algo que solo has visto en tus sueños más tenebrosos.{/n} «Has sido tocad{mf|o|a} por la corrupción. ¡Sabes que tu fin se acerca, alma maldita!».
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve, while the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}canker{/d} in your soul echoes ominously in response. Through the woman standing before you, something is staring at you, something you have seen only in your darkest dreams.{/n} "You are touched by corruption. You know that your doom is nigh, cursed soul!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los susurros clavan sus colmillos en tu recuerdo más doloroso como si fuera un nervio expuesto, mientras la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}llaga{/d} de tu alma resuena siniestramente en respuesta. Algo te mira a través de la mujer que tienes delante. Algo que solo has visto en tus sueños más tenebrosos.{/n} «Has sido tocad{mf|o|a} por la corrupción. ¡Sabes que tu fin se acerca, alma maldita!».

languages.text: {n}その囁きは、むき出しの神経だけでなくあなたの一番つらい記憶に牙を食い込ませ、それに呼応するように、魂の中の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}邪悪{/d}が不気味に残響する。目の前に立っている女を通して、何かがあなたを見つめている。暗黒の夢の中でしか見たことのない何かが。{/n}「あなたは腐敗に触れられた。破滅が近いことを知れ、呪われた魂よ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve, while the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}canker{/d} in your soul echoes ominously in response. Through the woman standing before you, something is staring at you, something you have seen only in your darkest dreams.{/n} "You are touched by corruption. You know that your doom is nigh, cursed soul!"

traits.locale_text: {n}その囁きは、むき出しの神経だけでなくあなたの一番つらい記憶に牙を食い込ませ、それに呼応するように、魂の中の{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}邪悪{/d}が不気味に残響する。目の前に立っている女を通して、何かがあなたを見つめている。暗黒の夢の中でしか見たことのない何かが。{/n}「あなたは腐敗に触れられた。破滅が近いことを知れ、呪われた魂よ！」

languages.text: {n}那些窃窃私语的声音将毒牙刺入你最痛苦的记忆之中，仿佛在啮咬着暴露在外的神经一样。作为回应，你灵魂中的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}溃疡{/d}也发出了不祥的回声。有什么东西正透过你前面的这个女人盯着你，那是你只有在最黑暗的梦境中才见过的东西。{/n}“你受到了腐化的触碰！噢，遭到诅咒的灵魂啊，你知道你末日将至！”
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve, while the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}canker{/d} in your soul echoes ominously in response. Through the woman standing before you, something is staring at you, something you have seen only in your darkest dreams.{/n} "You are touched by corruption. You know that your doom is nigh, cursed soul!"

traits.locale_text: {n}那些窃窃私语的声音将毒牙刺入你最痛苦的记忆之中，仿佛在啮咬着暴露在外的神经一样。作为回应，你灵魂中的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}溃疡{/d}也发出了不祥的回声。有什么东西正透过你前面的这个女人盯着你，那是你只有在最黑暗的梦境中才见过的东西。{/n}“你受到了腐化的触碰！噢，遭到诅咒的灵魂啊，你知道你末日将至！”

languages.text: {n}Fısıltılar, dişlerini açıktaki bir sinire batırır gibi en acı hatıralarına saplıyor. Ruhunda çıkan {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}çıban{/d}, uğursuzca sızlayarak karşılık veriyor. Yalnızca en karanlık rüyalarında gördüğün bir şey, önündeki kadının içinden sana bakıyor.{/n} "Yozluk sana dokunmuş. Felaketinin yakın olduğunu biliyorsun lanetli ruh!"
languages.original_text: {n}The whispers sink their fangs into your most painful memory as into an exposed nerve, while the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Signs}canker{/d} in your soul echoes ominously in response. Through the woman standing before you, something is staring at you, something you have seen only in your darkest dreams.{/n} "You are touched by corruption. You know that your doom is nigh, cursed soul!"
